Type.Name: StackFrame

TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit StackFrame extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: Represents some of the information that is available from a stack frame.
Docs.remarks: Security information should not be available using this class.
